metadata.purpose: Verified APIs for viral educational content - alternative outdoor school marketing

apis.name: UNESCO UIS Education API
apis.viral_potential: Compare education outcomes across countries - 'Kids in Finland get X hours of outdoor time vs Y in Singapore'

apis.name: World Bank Education API (EdStats)
apis.viral_potential: 4000+ education indicators - literacy, enrollment, spending comparisons

apis.name: OECD PISA Data API
apis.viral_potential: International student test scores - compare learning outcomes globally

apis.name: UNICEF Data API
apis.viral_potential: Child wellbeing indicators - early childhood development, health, education

apis.name: Our World in Data API
apis.viral_potential: 5000+ charts on global issues - beautifully formatted, ready for sharing

apis.name: Gapminder Data
apis.viral_potential: Hans Rosling-style animated statistics - proven viral format

apis.name: World Happiness Report Data
apis.viral_potential: Country happiness rankings - 'Here's why Thai kids are happier'

apis.name: NIMH Data Archive (ABCD Study)
apis.viral_potential: Screen time impact on child brain development - powerful data for outdoor education advocacy

apis.name: iNaturalist API
apis.viral_potential: Wildlife observations by location - 'What species live near your school?'

apis.name: GBIF Biodiversity API
apis.auth: None for read, account for downloads
apis.viral_potential: Species occurrence data globally - biodiversity education content

apis.name: eBird API
apis.viral_potential: Bird sightings by location - nature observation content

apis.name: OpenAQ Air Quality API
apis.viral_potential: Compare air quality: Singapore vs Phuket - powerful for health-conscious parents

apis.name: IQAir AirVisual API
apis.viral_potential: Real-time AQI comparisons - 'Your kids could breathe this instead'

apis.name: NASA APOD API
apis.viral_potential: Daily astronomy images - beautiful educational content

apis.name: Unsplash API
apis.viral_potential: 900k+ free high-quality photos for educational content

apis.name: Pexels API
apis.viral_potential: Free photos AND videos - great for social media content

apis.name: REST Countries API
apis.viral_potential: Country data for comparisons - flags, populations, languages

apis.name: ZenQuotes API
apis.viral_potential: Daily inspirational quotes for educational social content

apis.name: PubMed API (E-utilities)
apis.viral_potential: 35M+ research papers - cite studies on outdoor education benefits

apis.name: Springer Nature API
apis.viral_potential: 14M+ scientific documents - education and child development research

apis.name: ERIC Education Research API
apis.viral_potential: Education research database - evidence for alternative education methods

apis.name: CDC WONDER API
apis.viral_potential: Child health statistics - support health benefits of outdoor education

apis.name: Open-Meteo Weather API
apis.viral_potential: Weather comparisons - 'Perfect outdoor learning weather in Phuket today'

apis.name: Sunrise-Sunset API
apis.viral_potential: Golden hour calculations - beautiful outdoor photo content timing

apis.name: Marine Debris Tracker Data
apis.viral_potential: Beach cleanup data - environmental education content
